diff_hunk:
@@ -854,6 +856,22 @@ def test_cuda(self, test_case):
                 for cpu_d_p, gpu_d_p in zip(cpu_param[1], gpu_param[1]):
                     test_case.assertEqual(cpu_d_p, gpu_d_p, 2e-4)
 
+            # Run double-backwards on CPU and GPU and compare results

body: can we explicitly write check_gradgrad=False in all the test specifications where we need it?  This kind of code leads to people realizing months later that we never turned on the tests.
